title: FS/FT: Raw cards including HOFers and Polar Bears (CLOSED)
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FS/FT: Raw cards including HOFers and Polar Bears (CLOSED)
posts.post_content:
Raw cards available for sale or trade. Prefer to trade for any EPDGs available but also listening to other trades.

Buyer pays $2 shipping. PayPal friends preferred.

Anyone saying "I'll take it" gets priority. Will listen to offers though, especially if buying more than 1.

$SOLD Bresnahan Polar Bear. Small tear in front left.
$SOLD Burch batting. 
$SOLD Burns
$SOLD Chance red portrait
$SOLD Clarke portrait
$SOLDConroy batting 
$SOLD Crawford batting Polar Bear 
$SOLD Howell portrait with a sliver of name on top
$SOLD Jennings 1 hand Polar Bear 
$SOLD Knabe
$SOLD Latham Polar Bear
$SOLD Nattress
$SOLD Purtell
$SOLD Rhoades hands at chest
$SOLD Rossman
$SOLD Schmidt throwing
$SOLD Stovall portrait with fat top border PENDING
$SOLD Sweeney Polar Bear

Links go to higher resolution scans.

[url]https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B7a9JBGpoN27M3cwS1Bxd1ZSWkU[/url]
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=278623&d=1498920577[/IMG]

[url]https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B7a9JBGpoN27ZnFWRVhkdnptRTA[/url]
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=278624&d=1498920607[/IMG]
I'll take Schmidt and Rossman. PM coming.

Interested in sweeney polar bear- could i get a scan just of that card please?

Ed

Ed,

If you follow that Google Drive web link right above the picture you'll get a really high-resolution scan of the cards. You can then zoom way in on the Sweeney without a loss to the quality of the image. Props to the seller for providing high-res scans.

Hope this helps! Hope all is well on your end!

David
